title: Respecting differences
creator_credit: Panorama Productions and New South Wales Government
brief_description: Shows the difficulties that migrant children have in adjusting to Australian schools and culture, especially non-English speaking children. Recently the New South Wales Government has given funds to support the teaching of ethnic languages in many state schools which helps facilitate adjustment to Australian life.
